trans-unit.source: The repair tool performs these operations:

seg-source.mrk: The repair tool performs these operations:

target.mrk: L'outil de réparation réalise ces opérations :

trans-unit.source: A complete in-depth check of each block validity, and a reset of the counters keeping track of the number of occurrences of each block.

seg-source.mrk: A complete in-depth check of each block validity, and a reset of the counters keeping track of the number of occurrences of each block.

target.mrk: Une vérification en profondeur de la validité de chaque bloc, et une réinitialisation des compteurs gardant une trace du nombre d'occurrences de chaque bloc.

trans-unit.source: Each <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName"></MadCap:variable> client database</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe"></MadCap:variable> stream</MadCap:conditionalText> is then checked and for every listed block of every known file, the related counter is incremented, even if the block does not exist.

seg-source.mrk: Each <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName"></MadCap:variable> client database</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe"></MadCap:variable> stream</MadCap:conditionalText> is then checked and for every listed block of every known file, the related counter is incremented, even if the block does not exist.

target.mrk: Chaque <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">base de données client <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName"></MadCap:variable></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">flux <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe"></MadCap:variable></MadCap:conditionalText> est ensuite vérifié et tous les blocs listés de tous les fichiers connus, le compteur associé est incrémenté, même si le bloc n'existe pas.

trans-unit.source: When a file has at least one missing block, this file is labeled as erroneous.

seg-source.mrk: When a file has at least one missing block, this file is labeled as erroneous.

target.mrk: Lorsqu'un fichier contient au moins un bloc manquant, ce fichier est étiqueté comme étant erroneous.

trans-unit.source: When a databasestream has at least one erroneous file, this database is reported for a reload. This operation does not hide erroneous files, which are still displayed for browsing and restore purpose.

seg-source.mrk: When a databasestream has at least one erroneous file, this database is reported for a reload.
This operation does not hide erroneous files, which are still displayed for browsing and restore purpose.

target.mrk: Lorsqu'une base de données flux contient au moins un fichier erroneous, cette base de données est reportée pour un rechargement.
Cette opération ne cache pas les fichiers erroneous, qui sont toujours affichés à des fins de navigation et de restauration.

trans-unit.source: When the repair operation is over, every reference counter is correct and the status of missing blocks is updated on ADE.

seg-source.mrk: When the repair operation is over, every reference counter is correct and the status of missing blocks is updated on ADE.

target.mrk: Lorsque l'opération de réparation est terminée, chaque compteur de référence est correct et l'état des blocs manquants est mis à jour sur ADE.

trans-unit.source: If an erroneous file is still under protection on an active agent, the file is sent to the server again, giving an opportunity to retrieve the missing block. The last version of the file is fixed.There is a very high probability to fix most, if not all, previous file versions.

seg-source.mrk: If an erroneous file is still under protection on an active agent, the file is sent to the server again, giving an opportunity to retrieve the missing block.
The last version of the file is fixed.There is a very high probability to fix most, if not all, previous file versions.

target.mrk: Si un fichier erroneous est toujours sous protection d'un agent actif, le fichier est à nouveau envoyé au serveur, ce qui donne la possibilité de récupérer le bloc manquant.
La dernière version du fichier est corrigée. Il y a une très forte probabilité de réparer la plupart, sinon la totalité, des versions précédentes du fichier.

trans-unit.source: Launch this command in the bin directory of the installation directory:

seg-source.mrk: Launch this command in the bin directory of the installation directory:

target.mrk: Lancez cette commande dans le répertoire bin du répertoire d'installation :

trans-unit.source: Where is the location where your database is copied before the modifications take place.

seg-source.mrk: Where is the location where your database is copied before the modifications take place.

target.mrk: Où est l'emplacement où votre base de données est copiée avant que les modifications n'aient lieu.

trans-unit.source: When the repair process ends, start the ADE service.

seg-source.mrk: When the repair process ends, start the ADE service.

target.mrk: Lorsque le processus de réparation est terminé, démarrez le service ADE.

trans-unit.source: Repair Tool<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-05-30T15:26:24.4456129+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="partie à garder ?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-05-30T15:26:30.1856324+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> in the Upgrade Procedure</MadCap:annotation>

seg-source.mrk: Repair Tool<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-05-30T15:26:24.4456129+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="partie à garder ?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-05-30T15:26:30.1856324+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> in the Upgrade Procedure</MadCap:annotation>

target.mrk: Outil de réparation<MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2022-05-30T15:26:24.4456129+02:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="partie à garder ?" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2022-05-30T15:26:30.1856324+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> dans la procédure de mise à niveau</MadCap:annotation>

trans-unit.source: You must run the repair tool prior to upgrading from a version earlier than 1.2.9.

seg-source.mrk: You must run the repair tool prior to upgrading from a version earlier than 1.2.9.

target.mrk: Vous devez exécuter l'outil de réparation avant la mise à niveau à partir d'une version antérieure à 1.2.9.
